Real User Complaints

The ServiceTitan Reality

Don't take our word for it—here's what actual ServiceTitan customers say

(Source: BBB complaints, G2 reviews, TrustRadius 2024-2025)

Hidden Fees & Unauthorized Charges

"$5,276 unauthorized Marketing Pro charge"

Before we even launched the feature, ServiceTitan charged us for Marketing Pro. When we complained, they said it was in the "fine print."

"$353,000 annual cost for 30 technicians"

Started at $259/tech/month minimum. Add Marketing Pro, Phones Pro, implementation fees, SMS charges, and hidden costs —we're paying over $29K/month.

"Billing system is unclear"

We were charged thousands of dollars in unexplained fees. Transactions appear without explanation. Had to fight for refunds on services never used.

Painful 4-6 Month Onboarding

"We have NEVER BEEN ONBOARDED"

We paid for 1 year of ServiceTitan even though we do not use the software. Despite multiple promises, onboarding never happened. (BBB Complaint, Dec 2024)

"The onboarding process was chaotic"

Took 6 months to go live. Implementation team kept changing. Promised features were either unavailable or came with additional hidden costs.

"Takes a long time to set things up properly"

Even with their "onboarding team," it took us 4+ months. Heavy internal lift required. Our team was pulled away from customers constantly.

Worst Customer Service Ever

"Absolutely the worst customer service"

I've had in my entire life. When you have a problem, expect to wait weeks for resolution—if you get one at all. (BBB Review)

"31 BBB complaints in 3 years"

15 complaints in the last 12 months alone. Common themes: unresponsive support, weeks-long resolution times, promises not fulfilled.

"Multiple escalations remained unresolved"

Major issues affecting operations went unaddressed for weeks. Support is slow or completely unresponsive on critical problems.

Multi-Year Contract Prison

"$23,842 termination fee"

When we tried to leave after the system never worked properly, they had the audacity to say we owe $23,842 to terminate early.

"Forced into multi-year contracts"

Standard contracts are 2-3 years with auto-renewal. Need 90-day notice to cancel. Early termination fees are astronomical.

"Held hostage by contract"

We're stuck paying $30K+/month for software we barely use because the termination penalty is even worse. Can't reduce license count without penalties.

ServiceTitan: 31 BBB Complaints (Last 3 Years)

15 complaints in the last 12 months alone. Common issues: billing, support, contracts

Deep Dive

Why ServiceTitan Customers Choose Thorbis

5 critical differences that matter for your business

Transparent Pricing vs ServiceTitan's Hidden Costs

The ServiceTitan Pricing Reality

  • Minimum $259/tech/month ($3,108/year per technician)

    For a 10-tech team: $31,080/year minimum before any add-ons

  • $353,000 annual cost (real user reported)

    30-tech operation with Marketing Pro, Phones Pro, SMS, and implementation fees

  • $5,276 unauthorized Marketing Pro charge

    Charged before feature launch, buried in "fine print"

  • Per-module fees, SMS surcharges, implementation costs

    Not disclosed until after contract signed

The Thorbis Pricing Promise

  • $200/month base + transparent pay-as-you-go AI usage

    Average customer: $350-800/month all-in, unlimited office users

  • All charges visible in real-time dashboard

    See usage before billing, no surprise charges ever

  • Fixed implementation pricing disclosed upfront

    All-inclusive, no hidden fees, no third-party costs

  • Communications, AI, automation all included

    No separate SMS fees, call recording fees, or "Pro" add-ons

Typical savings: $200,000 - $300,000 annually for mid-size operations (20-40 techs)

Migration Roadmap

Your 30-45 Day Escape Plan

How we migrate ServiceTitan customers with zero downtime

1
Week 1-2
Data preparation

Export customers, equipment, pricebooks, and agreements from ServiceTitan with our guided templates.

Dedicated migration engineer assigned on day one.
Duplicate and inactive record cleanup performed for you.
Parallel environment created for validation.
2
Week 3-4
Process redesign

Thorbis solution architects map current workflows and recommend improvements to drive adoption.

Work-session to document current dispatch, estimating, and invoicing flows.
Configuration of AI assistant scripts and online booking rules.
Pilot technicians trained on mobile workflows with feedback loop.
3
Week 5-6
Launch & optimization

Roll out Thorbis in phases with live support, KPI dashboards, and bi-weekly optimization sessions.

Cutover weekend support to ensure zero missed jobs.
Post-launch KPI tracking for booking rate, invoice cycle time, and upsells.
Quarterly business reviews with product roadmap access.
